events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund for the purchase. The product I got is not what I paid for.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to the customer receiving an incorrect item instead of the one ordered.
Customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund case and contact the customer for next steps.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help you process the refund as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received, along with the order number, to help us verify the issue?
I have attached the photo of the wrong product and included my order number in the message. Please let me know what the next steps are.
Thank you for the photo and details. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days and arrange for a free return shipment.
I appreciate the quick response and the refund solution. Looking forward to the refund being processed soon. Thanks for your help!
The refund has been processed and confirmation has been sent to the customer. The case is marked as resolved.
Just checking in to ensure you have received the refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist with.
Yes, I have received the refund today. Everything is perfect now. Thank you again for your excellent customer service.
The case has been formally closed following confirmation from the customer that the refund was received and they are satisfied.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to collect feedback about the handling of the refund request.
The customer completed the survey and rated their experience as very satisfied with the support provided during the refund process.
The case has been archived as all activities are complete and no further actions are required.
